name: Bike Extreme: Superhero Rider
description:
You are ready for the motto tricky stunt bike superhero racing similar to real life physics base bike racer. In Bike Extreme: Superhero Rider jump bike in difficult stunt area without road rash game and you act as a superhero crazy stunt bike rider

Features:
- Be the crazy moto bike stunt master racer
- Perform your skills on thrilling tracks at full speed
- Amazing game of bike stunts and freestyle racing
- Wonderful amazing latest bike models
- High speed racing with Stunning HD graphics
- Exciting sound effects in action packed game
- Unique motorbike engine
- Smooth and easy control
